section.title: Setting up Bzr
section.para: To set up Bzr, do the following:

listitem.para: To make sure Bzr is installed in your system, run sudo apt-get install bzr
To set up your personal information for Bzr to use, run bzr whoami "John Doe <john.doe@gmail.com>"

section.title: Getting and updating Bzr branches
section.para: After you have set up Bzr, you can get a local copy of a branch by running bzr branch BRANCHNAME. This will create a directory for the branch.
To make sure your local copy is up to date, run bzr pull inside the branch directory.

section.title: Build dependencies
section.para: Before you can build a package, you will usually need to install its build dependencies. To do this, simply run sudo apt-get build-dep PACKAGENAME.
